title: Cheese Pie
directions: Crust: Mix 1 3/4 cups of rolled graham crackers, 2 ½ Tbsp sugar, ½ cup melted butter and put in pie pan
Mix 1 Lbs of cream cheese, 2 eggs, ¾ cup sugar, 1 tsp vanilla for 20 min. Pour mixture over crust and bake for 20 minutes on the middle rack.
Remove pie from oven and increase temperature to 450 degrees.
While oven is heating mix 1 ½ cups of sour cream, 3 Tbsp sugar, 1 ½ Tbsp vanilla, Spread on pie to cover.
Place pie back in oven for 5 minutes. After 5 minutes turn off oven and crack the door. Let cool undisturbed for 1 hour in the oven.
